channel.title: DRX-317 Brand new server! Looking for Players!
channel.description:
Welcome to the introduction of[b] DRX-317[/b] Brand new server owned by a few amazing coders, with a wonderful website development team and forum staff members and ingame staff members, and on top of that we are still looking for new staff members to join the team!
[b]Great Layout and Designs![/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/2_zpse1ae6350.png[/img]
[b]A few of the boss teleports. (There's another whole page!)[/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/45_zps6fd3d667.png[/img]
[b]FUN PK! [/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/funpk_zps413be442.png[/img]
[b]One of the many DRX-317 point shops! [/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/DRX317_zpsd80d8e0e.png[/img]
[b]TORVA![/b] :eek: [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/interface_zps8d4687ff.png[/img]
[b]SPIN TO WIN![/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/SPIN_zpsbb285009.png[/img]
[b]CONSTRUCTION YAY![/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/construction_zpsb47def84.png[/img]
[b]For all you minecrafters![/b] :cool: [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/MINECRAFTAHA_zps1f7184cb.png[/img]
[b]Easy simple help interfaces![/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/DRX3172_zps16093c69.png[/img]
[b]BOSSES![/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/bosses_zps3b467c37.png[/img]
[b]Loyalty point!(Lots of neat stuff!)[/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/Capture_zps4f54c4df.png[/img]
[b]Unique Monsters![/b] [img]http://i62.photobucket.com/albums/h119/jordynjohnwebber/N00b_zps9bc1ffe9.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]More pictures and information to come! Make sure to give us a look and tell us what we can improve on and what you like about the server SERVER IS STILL IN BETA REMEMBER THAT PLEASE Heres some links to help you out![/size][/b]
[size=24pt][b]Forums![/b][/size] [url=http://drx-317.forumotion.ca/]http://drx-317.forumotion.ca/[/url]
[b][size=24pt]Direct Client Download![/size][/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/12tzf97uz43b7jj/client.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/12tzf97uz43b7jj/client.jar[/url]
